title: Longbottom Leaf (1C300)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Possession
Game Text:	Pipeweed. Plays to your support area. When you play this possession, you may discard up to 2 cards from hand.
Lore:	Longbottom Leaf is the pipeweed enjoyed by most Hobbits throughout the Shire.
Rarity:	C
